plot: Dan and Livia help a disillusioned young woman in the 1970s straighten out her life.

Dan returns to the 70's during the time Nixon's presidency was unraveling. He and Livia team up and are involved in the life of Abby, a young woman whose future keeps changing as Dan returns to 2007, reads what happened to her and goes back and "fixes" that time line. Meanwhile the FBI starts investigating Jack and Dan based on the money Dan brought back from the hijacked airliner and the truth about Livia's time traveling comes out.—Ron Kerrigan <mvg@whidbey.com>
